reviewText: This DVD is great! My daughter loves Minnie and it's hard to find a story showcasing Minnie. Highly recommend.

This DVD is great!  My daughter is 2 years old and loves this DVD!  She is a huge fan of Mickey and all his friends!  We bought this to keep her entertained in the car on trips.  She never gets tired of it!  Definitely recommend this to any parent of a toddler!
Fun stories and it is great that mickey mouse clubhouse created this version specially for Mimi.
Granddaughter loves it!
Our kid loves everything that's Minnie Mouse. Great story.
So so cute. A must have for a Minnie Mouse loving kid! My daughter loves it!
My daughter loves it!
I was looking for more Minnie bowtique episodes and only 1 was included.  The others were just random other episodes. I was disappointed because that's what my daughter has been asking for.
My granddaughter loves Minnie
Granddaughters love it.
My daughter is in love with this movie and we've seen it about 100000000 times. Haha but seriously it's a cute show and she loves it. This disc has four episodes.
My middle and youngest daughter watch all the time. They love Minnie mouse.
Cute, watched it a few weeks, but won't watch it any more

This is not what I was expecting. I thought it would have Minnie bowtique epsiodes but it did not. Instead it had boring episodes and then one that tells how Minnie stared her bowtique. Also the video quality is not that great.
3 year old granddaughter loves this.
A birthday gift for great grandaughter
my daughter adores minnie mouse
grand kids love it and it shows well.
my granddaughter loves it.
none
My daughter loved this movie

Christmas present for my granddaughter she is a Minnie Mouse girl, she will absolutely love this.  I will need to update review after Christmas as I do not want to open just yet. To me anything Disney is A OK.
Fast shipping as expected. My granddaughter is 2 & she loves these 4 episodes
bought it for my granddaughter and she loves watching it over and over again
Package arrived on time and was still in the packaging. No scratches or issues with this DVD.
Minnie is so precious. Great episodes!!!
Not a movie like I first thought. It's 4 episodes of the club house show. Also the case was broken so the dvd was just sliding around, it wasn't scratched or anything but still disappointed.
Kids love this
Love it.
This was wrapped in plastic but when I opened it up it was not attached to the center and was scratched from not being attached to the center
My 2 yr old is obsessed with Minnie Mouse & Mickey's clubhouse. cute episodes
cute
Ripped within 2 hours of wearing it.

This is actually 4 Mackey Mouse Clubhouse episodes that are around the Bow-tique opening. I was looking for the little bowtique episodes from the end of the show. My 3 yr old still likes this DVD, it's just not what I was looking for.
My daughter loves this DVD
Bought as a gift for a minnie mouse lover and she loved it!!!
My kids love it
a gift and was loved
Works
My 2 year old loves this!
Has 4 episodes only one bowtique episode thought it would be all minnie bowtique episodes.
I purchased this video for my daughter's birthday party. We had a Minnie Mouse theme and I had this playing in the background at home while the kids were playing. She loves watching it.
Well, we were fooled by the packaging. These are simply four episodes of Mickey Mouse. I assumed they would be special Minnie Mouse shows, like the bow toons. Very disappointing!
Very good Granddaughter watches and learns from it also
My granddaughter loved this movie.  Very quick delivery.

Could have used a few more episodes. It gets old when your kid watches the same ones repeatedly. I knew what was on it when buying but you can get the same price in store for other ones with more episodes.
My girls love this Dvd!
daughter loved it. already bought another movie. and will continue to buy more

My grand-daughter is in love with Minnie ' s little nieces, Millie & Melody.
Can someone please tell me which movies other than Minnie ' s Winter Bow Show, that they show up in?
Thanks
OMG such a favorite!  Has a 1 year old boy and a 2 year old girl completely spellbound!
My girls love these dvds
Perfect for long car rides or overnights at the grandparents

Very disappointed, I thought this had Minnie Mouse boutique episodes but they're just regular Micky mouse clubhouse shows.  Of course my daughter doesn't mind but I never would have paid money for this if I had known otherwise...
My daughter LOVES Minnie Mouse! And she so she loves this movie.

I bought this for my great-niece for Christmas. I've been having such a hard time finding Minnie's Winter Bow Show on dvd in store and online that I bought her the next best thing. I hope she likes this.

Purchased this for my niece for Christmas. I personally have not played it buy it looks like it will be an enjoyable DVD for her. How can you go wrong with Minnie Mouse or Disney. Will add more when I find out how her parents and she like it.
Can't wait to give to my daughter for Christmas.
Gift
Love it
Daughter loves this
I thought this was full of bowtique episodes. Maybe I didn't read well enough, but I was disappointed once I saw it was just 4 clubhouse episodes.
Kid loved it
My daughter loves it!!!
Perfect for any Minnie Mouse fan. This is my daughters favorite DVD to watch now.
I had to clean it of before I put it on my DVD player to dusty.

Bought this for my almost 2 year old son who loves Mickey. I always thought it was crazy that people would pay $15 in store for a single episode so I was pleasantly surprised when I realized it's 4 episodes. I was desperate b/c my son was screaming in the car so I grabbed this movie and had a peaceful drive the rest of the way.
My granddaughter love's. Her minnie mouse movie
Disc worked a few times...now it skips badly.
My 2 year old loves this show
Great Gift

My grand daughter was so into Minnie Mouse  for such a long time. She adored Minnie and her bow-tique. I'm sure I've watched this video with her at least a dozen times and it's really cute and totally appropriate for a toddler.
Great DVD, my granddaughter loves everything with Minnie, wonderful stories that all kids would love.

I bought this movie as a gift for my daughter for an Easter gift. She loves it, we watch it almost every single day. We'll worth my money, and she's happy. If your child love Minnie I'm sure this would be a hit!!!
my daugter dances to it all day
Great addition to my little ones movies the shows are cute
Grand daughter loves this dvd!

Well, I bought this for my daughter. When it came the the prongs that hold the dvd were broke and the DVD slid around in the case. No scratches thankfully. As long as your DVD case doesn't break its a great buy.
My granddaughter and her Minnie Mouse, Great price for the enjoyment she gets.
Cute and the kids enjoyed it.
So cute! Our children love it!
2 year old loves this video, very cute
5 stars!
Exactly what we needed. Our little girl prefers Minnie over Mickey. And it comes with audio options in three languages, English, French, and Spanish.
My daughter loves Minnie! This video is great for her. Educational as well. They teach letters, colors and numbers on the show.
My daughter loves it.
Grand Daughter Loved it

My daughter is in love with Mickey and Minnie Mouse. I purchased this video so she can watch it whenever she wants. Lets just say that she practically watches it everyday!! It has alot of commercials but its a pretty decent video for children 2-4yrs old. I would recommend buying.
Cute movie
Cute movie to add to our stock of all of them
This made a little girl one happy lady.
Great product & shipping was super fast!
If your children love Minnie, great movie!
The 20 month old I purchased this for loves Minnie Mouse, and she sat right down at our family party and watched it.  And loved it.
Bought as Christmas gift for my granddaughter.
perfect present
My 3 year old loves Minnie.  She does get a little upset when Mickey starts off the shows, but she calms down when she realizes they're actually focused on Minnie.
my son love Mickey Mouse  Clubhouse he just can't get enough of it.
great if your a little girl and like Minnie mouse
my child loves it
Kids enjoyed it.
he  loves this one also
granddaughter loves these
Great, timely.
CUTE
My granddaughter is 3 yrs old  and loved it.

Daughter loves this dvd. We have to watch it several times a week. So glad that they put all the episodes that feature Minnie on a disc together. My little one loves Mickey Mouse Club House but would rather watch Minnie.
Granddaughter loved it !!!
7yr old grand daughter just returned from disney, enamored with minnie, loved the songs, listens over and over
Bought as a gift - delivered quickly and just as described. Thanks.
works great
It is a cute DVD but if you are looking for the bowtique episodes then this is not the dvd for you. I am still in search of a dvd that has them on it!
My 3 year old loves these episodes.
Grand kids love her
I bought this product for my daughter who loves Mickey Mouse! This is a good idea to have! Great buy
my grand daughter loves this video....she loves it so much, that i now know every word and song in this movie
This is for my granddaughter that loves Minnie Mouse & watching DVD's.  You can't beat the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse movies.
There was not any Bow Toon episodes on this I was totally disappointed. i just found out about this, seeing it was a gift for my grandchild. Other people have had the same problem.
This is such a great movie the kids love it. They learn so much from this, I have a daycare and the kids love it.

When this DVD arrived the case was broken inside (the part that holds the DVD in place) and the DVD had just been bouncing around inside getting scratched. Still plays so not worth sending back but I am not happy about it!

My daughter loves this! She always wants to watch this over
And over. She loves the mickey mouse club housd

Was fine, was almost just what I expected, my daughter absolutely love Minnie's bowtique, though it is not the first cartoon on the DVD as the main feature or any longer then the others, which I found odd and a little annoying.
My kids love Disney/Mickey and this movie is great! I have purchased more than 10 Disney movies and loved them all.
Our granddaughter love Minnie Mouse, her favorite, of the Clubhouse Gang. She squeals with joy when this DVD is put on. I'd recommend this DVD to anyone with little girls who love Minnie Mouse.
My daughter absolutely loves Minnie and could watch this movie all day if you let her. Great variety of mini shows.
Our 2 year old loves Minnie so this movie was a perfect addition to our movie collection, she loves it!
Cute movie to keep a 1 year old happy!  These little shows are great for a ride to the store, not too long and every little girl loves Minnie Mouse!
gifts for grand child age 3 who loves minnie mouse as much as  candy.  great gift for a little one
My daughter loves watching Minnie every time she gets. It's very hard to break her attention from Minnie! She just loves the colors this cartoon has to offer!
My Daughter loves Minnie's Bow-tique.  I Was happy with the price and shipping time.  I highly recommend it to all you mothers.
This item was a gift for my granddaughter and she is pleased with it. She loves everything Minnie Mouse and this is just her cup of tea:) she loves playing with.
my daughters eyes light up when the mickey mouse clubhouse comes on tv & now i have it at home for her to enjoy at any hour of the day
it met my child's expectations and I see it as money well spent and value received for it too. I
Bought this for my two year old grandaughter. She loves it, she would watch it all day if I let her!
My little friend loves Minnie Mouse and this was the answer to her need to see her often. Each episode stars Minnie and some of her friends too of course, but Minnie was the reason for the purchase!
I liked this product because it was age appropriate as indicated; fun; high energy; playful; and the perfect gift after all.
Super cute DVD was purchased as a gift for a coworker's daughter.  She loves and was just what she wanted.
Such a cute little video. My daughter loves Minnie mouse and this video will keep her entertained for awhile. It's ab an hour long I would say
My 2 year old daughter was so excited to receive this movie to watch while traveling on vacation. It's the new favorite!

Please understand that the DVD itself is great. We bought this DVD though thinking it was going to be mainly about Minnie, but it wasn't. Only 1 episode was the Minnie Bowtique and the rest were other Mickey Mouse Clubhouse episodes. My son still enjoys the DVD, but if you are buying it strictly for Minnie them this may not be the DVD for you.
My daughter loves this show. She will watch it over and over. I don't mind though, it's not the most annoying show out there.

We are now the proud owners of 6 DVDs .Great entertainment, color and songs are great.
When the program is not on TV we can just pop one in and watch it.
Two-year old Minnie Mouse fan is in love with this DVD!  I bought this DVD along with another Minnie Mouse DVD for her birthday and she always has a hard time choosing which one to watch!

I was looking for a DVD containing all of the 5-minute "Minnie's Bow-tique" cartoons that air at the ends of regular episodes. I thought this might be it, but it's actually 4 full-length episodes, and only one is actually centered on the Bow-tique. The description wasn't very clear or I just didn't understand it I guess.
Bought as a gift for my grand daughter she loves Mickey Mouse she watches it and loves it. Great learning!
What can i say my 9 month old daughter loves minnie mouse so how can you go wrong, awesome product and price
My daughter LOVES Minnie Mouse!!  She watches this movie on repeat.  It is a favorite of hers.  Ages 2 and up.

Ever since we bought this, my daughter (2yr old) will ask for "mouse on" at least once a day.  There are about 5-6 episodes on the disc and she has now gotten to the point that she can talk/sing along to parts of each episode.  Great entertainment for her and she's learning so much.  When I can't stand watching or listening, I can leave the room and she is still enthralled.  It was definitely worth it!!
The episodes are the perfect length of time to occupy my granddaughters when I need a few minutes...like at their lunchtime!

Minnie's pajama party
Minnie's birthday bowtique
Minnie's bee story
Minnie's picnic
Cute stories, 3 and 5 y/o love it!  Good enough.
My daughter is really into Minnie Mouse. She asks me to play it for her and it keeps her entertained
My little Minnie fan is in love with this DVD, all she wants to  do is sit in front of the TV and watch it! Great buy!!!
i bought this for my daughter that four, for the dvd player i have in my truck for long drives and she loves it.
very much reccommend this fir any child of diff ages, my granddaughter has already watched it more times then I can count
Anything with Minnie Mouse is a big hit with my grandaughter. She has watched this so many times I should have bought a second one as a back up.
My daughter loves minnie Mouse and this movie is perfect for her because it is stories about Minnie adventures...she could watch this movie over and over and never tire of it.
Cute stories and surprisingly it aided in teaching my 2 yr old how to count and helps her understand quantity.
This is good for an 18 month old...the pieces are large and with help, she can dress Minnie. Very cute.
Bought this dvd for my daughter to make long road trips a little better.  This is one of her favorite! It's nice to find dvd's cheaper than you can get them in the store.

Mickey Mouse and friends has always been a classic and still is in my family. Now I am passing on a tradition to my granddaughter...............she loved this DVD!!  Can't wait 'til she sees Minnie and Mickey @ Disneyworld!  Will buy more of this collection.......jb
This is used in CHOC to entertain the kids who are hospitalized. They say the kids love it. Try it.
good for younger children just starting to watch tv my daughter plays this and a couple other dvds over and over again
My 2 year old is really into Mickey mouse Clubhouse and this movie she loves so much she watches it over and over
My 3 year old daughter LOVES Mickey Mouse Clubhouse. This dvd is so cute and allows her to explore her "girly" side. Realistically, there is no reason a little boy wouldn't enjoy them too ;)
My daughter loves this movie and it does helps me to keep her entertained  at home while I am doing things around!
Love the Disney collection. Arrived very qyuickly. Great present for a 1 year old!  Would recommend for all toddlers of this age.

I gave this to my niece on christmas and was a little worry if it would be a dissapointment to her, but she loves it.  She won't stop seeing it.

This DVD it's a great addition to someone who loves minnie very much as my niece does.
My daughter Loves Minnie Mouse and has watched this many time since Christmas. The item arrived very fast and she loves it.
My daughters got this DVD for Christmas (2012) and love it! You can never go wrong with Dora! They have watched it already a few times and they unwrapped it only 24 hours ago :-)
I bought this for my grandaughter, and she is a big fan of Minnie Mouse and he was very happy to receive it. Thank you Jackie
Two year old Granddaughter loves Minnie. A A A A A A A A A A A A A A

So first things first, have you signed up for Disney Movie Rewards? Go sign up disneymovierewards.com and then everytime you buy a disney movie you enter in the code and get points to spend on free stuff, like more movies, gifts, sticker books, lots of fun stuff. Ive gotten lunchboxes etc, - thats not the point, and I don't get points if you sign up, I just think if your checking out disney cartoons you should know. Anyways, I LOVE that they are making Minnie Mouse staring videos, I have a little girl and love that Minnie has her head together and can solve problems, my little one is just starting to love Minnie and Mickey, and this is another great girl power cartoon, and not something where she needs to be rescued. Yeah Minnie! She has help from her friends, great team work video. I buy these for car trips for the car.
My 3 month old daughter LOVES every episode of Minnie's bowtique! she always smiles, laughs & coos when watching. The colors, animation & sounds really stimulate her in a great way! super recommend.
Purchased for an avid 3 yr old Minnie lover and she loves her new movie.  She asks to watch it all the time!
My daughter loves this movie! She watches it a few times a week. It includes  Minnie's Bowtique and a few other episodes.
We got this as a gift for my daughter for christmas so it is not opened yet. But it looks so cute...even better then the picure

My grand-kids ages one and four love the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse video's.
The tape is a excellent learning tool.  Great for Christmas!
My daughter is a Minnie Mouse fanatic.  This DVD was a great addition to our collection and my daughter has watched this over and over again.  Very cute songs and story.
What can I say the smile and the full attention that my nephew pays when watching this cartoon, its priceless.
I bought this for my two granddaughters, 3 yrs and 20 months.  They adore it and watch again and again.

Something is wrong with this DVD. It doesn't have fastplay so I have to pick the episode I want each time and once the episode is over it will go back to playing the same episode over and over again. I buy lots of DVD's through amazon and I never had that problem before. It's annoying not to be able to play it all. Every 30 minutes I have to come and choose the next episode. Other then that the stories are cute- what else would you expect from a Mickey Clubhouse movie?

Another in the series of Mickey Mouse Clubhouse offerings.  This one is up to the high standards of the earlier ones.  Cute stories.  The Bow-Tique story is probably aimed toward girls more than the boys.

We bought this when my little one was only 15 months old.  She absolutely adores it!  Far from being scary, she laughs, claps, and dances her way through every episode.  It's a lovely collection for every miniature Mickey fan.

I highly recommend it.  It's very appropriate for toddlers.  Sorry 1 mom's 2 year old got scared, but my 15 month old had a great time.

My two year old LOVES anything Mickey and Minnie Mouse so when this DVD came out, I immediately bought it for her.  Little did I know it would terrify her!  There is an episode where they are having a sleep over and hear scary noises in the night.  I don't really think that it is toddler appropriate.  My daughter watched it with two friends and I very quickly had 3 crying toddlers on my hands.
my daughter loves it, and how I don't have to constantly press play. Lots of episodes too! Perfect.
NICE

My 2.5yr old watches this over & over. I like that it is kid friendly & engaging them to think & not just zone out.  Daughter follows along, counts out loud & decides which mousetool to use to solve problems.
gift for granddaughter who loves it

The description of this item is not clear at all. This DVD is NOT all Minnie bowtique episodes which, by the description and look of the box you would assume. Disappointed. I would not have purchased if I knew it wasn't all minnie bowtique episodes.

I watched this with my 3-3/4 year old granddaughter and we both liked it.  I especially like the episode where Minnie is opening her Bow-Tique and has a variety of colorful and interesting types of bows for sale.  The other episodes are adorable too.  My granddaughter loves them all.
Nnice
Loved it
Minnie Mouse is a huge hit at our house
One of her new favotites!
